title: Confused Biden with Obama (Multiple Times)
summary: Trump repeatedly mixed up Barack Obama and Joe Biden during 2023-2024 campaign. Said 'We're beating Obama' in the polls and claimed he was running against Obama in 2024. Also confused Nikki Haley with Nancy Pelosi.
keyFacts: Repeatedly mixed up Barack Obama and Joe Biden during 2023-2024 campaign
Claimed he was running against Obama in 2024
Also confused Nikki Haley with Nancy Pelosi when discussing January 6
Multiple instances across different rallies and interviews
